SELECT t.cityname as cityname, t.storeid as platformid, t.storeno as storeno, t.stname as storename, IFNULL(t.ename,'') as employeename, IFNULL(t.eid,'') as employeeid, IFNULL(SUM(IF(t._type=1,t._count,0)),0) AS dashang, IFNULL(SUM(IF(t._type=2,t._count,0)),0) AS good FROM ( (SELECT a.`name` as cityname, ts.`name` AS stname, ts.id AS storeid, ts.`code` as storeno, tem.`name` AS ename, tem.id AS eid, COUNT(DISTINCT tor.id) AS _count, 1 AS _type from t_order tor JOIN t_order_flow tof on tof.order_id=tor.id LEFT JOIN t_eshop tep on tep.id=tor.eshop_id LEFT JOIN t_employee tem on tem.id=tor.employee_id LEFT JOIN t_store ts on ts.id=tor.store_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_area a on ts.city_code = a.code and a.level = 2 where tof.create_time>=#{begindate} and tof.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and tof.order_status='signed' AND EXISTS (select 1 from t_store where id=tor.store_id and number IN (${storeids})) AND ts.`name` not like '%测试%' AND tep.`name` not like '%测试%' AND ts.white!='QA' AND tep.white!='QA' AND tep.business_model_id!='fakemodelforexpress0000000000001' GROUP BY tem.id ORDER by ts.`name`,tem.`name` ) UNION (select a.`name` as cityname, ts.`name` AS stname, ts.id as storeid, ts.`code` as storeno, tem.`name` AS ename, tem.id AS eid, COUNT(DISTINCT tor.id) AS _count, 2 AS _type from t_order tor JOIN t_order_flow tof on tof.order_id=tor.id LEFT JOIN t_eshop tep on tep.id=tor.eshop_id LEFT JOIN t_ed_sys_role tesr on tesr.id=tep.department_id LEFT JOIN t_employee tem on tem.id=tor.employee_id LEFT JOIN t_store ts on ts.id=tor.store_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_area a on ts.city_code = a.code and a.level = 2 where tof.create_time>=#{begindate} and tof.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND tof.order_status='signed' AND EXISTS (select 1 from t_store where id=tor.store_id and number IN (${storeids})) AND tesr.role_name not like '%线下联盟%' AND tesr.role_name not like '%快周边%' AND ts.`name` not like '%测试%' AND tep.`name` not like '%测试%' AND ts.white!='QA' AND tep.white!='QA' AND tep.business_model_id!='fakemodelforexpress0000000000001' GROUP BY tem.id ORDER by ts.`name`,tem.`name` ) ) t GROUP BY t.eid ORDER by t.stname,t.ename
LIMIT ${limitcond}

SELECT IFNULL(t.ename,'') as employeename, IFNULL(SUM(IF(t._type=1,t._count,0)),0) AS dashang, IFNULL(SUM(IF(t._type=2,t._count,0)),0) AS good FROM ( (SELECT a.`name` as cityname, ts.`name` AS stname, ts.id AS storeid, ts.`code` as storeno, tem.`name` AS ename, tem.id AS eid, COUNT(DISTINCT tor.id) AS _count, 1 AS _type from t_order tor JOIN t_order_flow tof on tof.order_id=tor.id LEFT JOIN t_eshop tep on tep.id=tor.eshop_id LEFT JOIN t_employee tem on tem.id=tor.employee_id LEFT JOIN t_store ts on ts.id=tor.store_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_area a on ts.city_code = a.code and a.level = 2 where tof.create_time>=#{begindate} and tof.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and tof.order_status='signed' AND ts.`name` not like '%测试%' AND tep.`name` not like '%测试%' AND ts.white!='QA' AND tep.white!='QA' AND tep.business_model_id!='fakemodelforexpress0000000000001' GROUP BY tem.id ORDER by ts.`name`,tem.`name` ) UNION (select a.`name` as cityname, ts.`name` AS stname, ts.id as storeid, ts.`code` as storeno, tem.`name` AS ename, tem.id AS eid, COUNT(DISTINCT tor.id) AS _count, 2 AS _type from t_order tor JOIN t_order_flow tof on tof.order_id=tor.id LEFT JOIN t_eshop tep on tep.id=tor.eshop_id LEFT JOIN t_ed_sys_role tesr on tesr.id=tep.department_id LEFT JOIN t_employee tem on tem.id=tor.employee_id LEFT JOIN t_store ts on ts.id=tor.store_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_area a on ts.city_code = a.code and a.level = 2 where tof.create_time>=#{begindate} and tof.create_time<DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND tof.order_status='signed' AND tesr.role_name not like '%线下联盟%' AND tesr.role_name not like '%快周边%' AND ts.`name` not like '%测试%' AND tep.`name` not like '%测试%' AND ts.white!='QA' AND tep.white!='QA' AND tep.business_model_id!='fakemodelforexpress0000000000001' GROUP BY tem.id ORDER by ts.`name`,tem.`name` ) ) t GROUP BY t.eid HAVING employeename = #{employeeno}
